EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_PARTY_001.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_PARTY_001.text: Name's Tsunanori. Good to be here.

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_002.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_002.text: Don't expect too much here, eh?

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_008.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_008.text: Can't get careless, even against saps.

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_009.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_009.text: Just gotta do it like always.

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_010.text: Better stay on our toes here.

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_013.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_013.text: Give it all you got, folks!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_015.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_015.text: This mean I'm not good enough?

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_SET_001.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_SET_001.text: I'll show ya what a Mido's made of!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_INSPI_002.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_INSPI_002.text: Oh hey, that's more like it!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_DEAD_001.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_DEAD_001.text: Well, heck. Guess this is it...

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_RESULT_004.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_RESULT_004.text: Feels like a lightbulb turned on.

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_008.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_008.text: I need more to hone my spirit.

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_010.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_010.text: We grow only when pushed to our limit.

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_011.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_011.text: Let us see how far this goes!

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_012.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_012.text: A kugutsu always protects their master!

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_014.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_014.text: I'll take it from here, Tsunanori.

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_015.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_015.text: Now is not the time for crisis.

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_SET_001.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_SET_001.text: I'll strike with all I have!

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_SS_001.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_SS_001.text: Behold the peak of my ability!

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMB_005.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMB_005.text: I'll make the most of this!

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_CO_001.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_CO_001.text: Here lies the essence of the elements!

EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_009.speaker: Sukune_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_009.text: Now here's a foe to grapple with!

EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_010.speaker: Sukune_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_010.text: This will not be won without sacrifice.

EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_014.speaker: Sukune_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_014.text: Now the kugutsu come into play!

EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_015.speaker: Sukune_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_015.text: So long as our hearts remain as one!

EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_SS_001.speaker: Sukune_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_SS_001.text: You wish for me to perform alone?

EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_RESULT_002.speaker: Sukune_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_RESULT_002.text: Though battered and beaten, we grow.

EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_RESULT_010.speaker: Sukune_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_RESULT_010.text: We shall never claim victory now.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_PARTY_001.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_PARTY_001.text: A lovely verse comes to mind.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_002.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_002.text: Beyond the capital, droplets of blood fall like rain.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_008.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_008.text: Even the weak boast a measure of spirit.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_009.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_009.text: The heart leaps at a joyous battle.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_010.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_010.text: Ever in dreams shall my foe's strength linger.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_011.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_011.text: May we never fall from such heights.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_012.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_012.text: For you alone would I surrender my life.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_014.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMM_014.text: The winds of autumn caress what remains.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_SS_001.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_SS_001.text: A thing so cruel can be but reality!

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_SS_002.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_SS_002.text: The blossoms' colors take on a new hue!

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMB_003.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMB_003.text: Had I known this to be a dream...

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMB_005.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_COMB_005.text: Rife with sadness is this world.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_CO_001.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_CO_001.text: Without end, I think of you...

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_FINISH_002.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_FINISH_002.text: My heart aflame within my breast.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_FINISH_003.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_FINISH_003.text: Do not begrudge the end's coming.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_DEAD_001.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_DEAD_001.text: That which changes is the human spirit.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_RESULT_001_B.text: My reality grows with each passing moment.

EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_RESULT_010.speaker: Komachi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_KOMACHI_RESULT_010.text: So are my words forever lost.

EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_COMM_008.speaker: Bou_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_COMM_008.text: I'll end this in one blow.

EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_COMM_010.speaker: Bou_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_COMM_010.text: Take 'em out one at a time!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_COMM_014.speaker: Bou_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_COMM_014.text: I can't aim while I'm crying!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Bou_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_RESULT_001_B.text: Ha ha ha! Just let me handle everything!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_RESULT_010.speaker: Bou_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_RESULT_010.text: This seriously the end of the line!?

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_001.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_001.text: I'll give it all I got!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_002.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_002.text: I'll show you what a witch can do!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_SET_001.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_SET_001.text: Time to kick it into gear!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_INSPI_002.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_INSPI_002.text: Hope it's cool if I do this!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_FINISH_003.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_FINISH_003.text: Please let this be the end!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_RESULT_001.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_RESULT_001.text: I'm growing as a witch every day.

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_RESULT_004.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_RESULT_004.text: So I can come up with new stuff?

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_RESULT_009.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_RESULT_009.text: Augh! I'm a failure of a witch!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_PARTY_001.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_PARTY_001.text: The Dismal King counts you among his vassals.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_001.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_001.text: So these are to be our opponents? I see.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_002.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_002.text: My powers have yet to return.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_009.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_009.text: You would stand against me? Intriguing.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_013.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_013.text: This is hardly cause for panic.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_SET_001.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_SET_001.text: Kneel before the Dismal King's power!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_SS_001.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_SS_001.text: Just how great IS my power?

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_SS_002.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_SS_002.text: Bear witness to the Dismal King!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_FINISH_006.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_FINISH_006.text: See you now the power of the vow?

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_RESULT_001.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_RESULT_001.text: A portion of my power returns.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_RESULT_004.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_RESULT_004.text: Oh my. This is certainly new.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_RESULT_009.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_RESULT_009.text: Is this the end of the Dismal King's journey!?

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_009.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_009.text: The real test will be much harder.

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_010.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_010.text: A witch truly shines in battle.

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_011.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_011.text: Caution is warranted in times like these.

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_SS_001.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_SS_001.text: I think I prefer a starring role.

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMB_001.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMB_001.text: I'll take the lead. With me!

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMB_005.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMB_005.text: We must use this to our advantage.

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_FINISH_001.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_FINISH_001.text: Why did you even come here?

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_RESULT_002.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_RESULT_002.text: Must have taken a small catnap there...

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_010.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_010.text: This is a most dangerous foe.

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_014.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_014.text: I am a disgrace of a squire.

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_INSPI_002.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_INSPI_002.text: You won't find THIS power in Pulchra!

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_SS_001.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_SS_001.text: Even a squire can sometimes take the lead.

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_SS_002.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_SS_002.text: Time for this squire to shine!

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_FINISH_002.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_FINISH_002.text: Did you see that!? DID YOU!?

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_FINISH_003.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_FINISH_003.text: I've fulfilled my duty as a squire!

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_FINISH_004.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_FINISH_004.text: A bit of my personality snuck out.

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_FINISH_006.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_FINISH_006.text: My duty is the same no matter who I serve.

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_RESULT_010.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_RESULT_010.text: Report: Ameya Aisling has failed her Witchterms.

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_002.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_002.text: Don't get your hopes upâ€”I'm just a copy.

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_009.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_009.text: Hmm... How should I play with them?

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_INSPI_001.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_INSPI_001.text: Can a god really learn something new?

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_OA_001.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_OA_001.text: Can copies have their own style?

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_SS_001.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_SS_001.text: Ooo, look at me! I'm the Goddess Macha!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMB_001.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMB_001.text: It's more fun when everyone plays!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_FINISH_003.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_FINISH_003.text: I can't believe we're not dead!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_RESULT_001.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_RESULT_001.text: Copies can also learn and grow.

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_RESULT_001_B.text: Maybe I'll get even stronger than the real Macha!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_RESULT_002.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_RESULT_002.text: I'm a copy. I'll be fine.

EV_TEXT_BT_GENERAL_PARTY_001.speaker: General_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_GENERAL_PARTY_001.text: What a privilege for you to have me.

EV_TEXT_BT_GENERAL_RESULT_010.speaker: General_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_GENERAL_RESULT_010.text: A flaw in my tactics!? Impossible!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_PARTY_001.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_PARTY_001.text: We walk the path of the warrior!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_013.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_013.text: Stand back and leave it to me.

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_INSPI_002.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_INSPI_002.text: If only I'd had this technique before!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_OA_001.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_OA_001.text: Adaptability is the key to battle.

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_SS_002.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_SS_002.text: This is the meaning of might!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMB_001.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMB_001.text: I have the vanguard! On me!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_CO_001.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_CO_001.text: Splendid! They will witness our skill!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_RESULT_002.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_RESULT_002.text: This scar is another part of my legacy.

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_RESULT_010.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_RESULT_010.text: Everyone has fallen before my eyes...

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_PARTY_001.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_PARTY_001.text: I look forward to new learnings.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_002.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_002.text: Physical exertion is outside my expertise.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_008.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_008.text: There's little to gain from weak opponents.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_009.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_009.text: We can learn much from this enemy.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_011.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_011.text: The tide turns in our favor.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_CO_001.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_CO_001.text: Teamwork and might is top-flight strategy.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_CO_002.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_CO_002.text: This is the way of victory!

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_FINISH_004.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_FINISH_004.text: An effective use of one's tools.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_FINISH_006.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_FINISH_006.text: Lend me the power of BLOOD!

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_RESULT_001.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_RESULT_001.text: So this is how I'm to grow...

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_RESULT_002.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_RESULT_002.text: We must aim higher than mere victory.

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_INSPI_002.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_INSPI_002.text: Why must this flood my mind!?

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_SS_001.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_SS_001.text: Stay back. I will kill them all.

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_FINISH_004.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_FINISH_004.text: Something wrong with how I operate?

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_RESULT_001_B.text: I've become a more effective killer.

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_PARTY_001.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_PARTY_001.text: Hey there, mates! We'll get on great!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_002.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_002.text: Gonna punch 'em good like I should.

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_008.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_008.text: No cold feet or you're beat!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_010.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_010.text: Ready, steady, and my poetry is heady!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_011.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_011.text: Be brave and ride the wave!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_013.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_013.text: Here's a rhyme for hero time!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_015.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_015.text: Can't believe I let you down...

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_INSPI_001.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_INSPI_001.text: Time to simmer this shimmer of a glimmer!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_SS_001.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_SS_001.text: All eyes on me, ya see!?

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMB_002.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMB_002.text: Don't stop it or drop it, just top it!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMB_003.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMB_003.text: Rhyme and flow on the go!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMB_005.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMB_005.text: I come for you and you're through!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_FINISH_001.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_FINISH_001.text: This poem never ends, my friends!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_FINISH_002.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_FINISH_002.text: Do or die for this guy!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_FINISH_003.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_FINISH_003.text: You lost to the best; time to rest.

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_FINISH_004.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_FINISH_004.text: I'm on the level of a devil!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_RESULT_001_B.text: Victory's mine, so fine by design!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_RESULT_002.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_RESULT_002.text: Got bumped in this dump like a chump.

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_PARTY_001.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_PARTY_001.text: I'll leave ya behind if you can't keep up.

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_002.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_002.text: I'll show ya how a champion fights!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_012.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_012.text: So how do we come back from this?

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_015.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_015.text: I don't need someone draggin' us down.

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_INSPI_002.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_INSPI_002.text: Call it a miracle or whatever you want!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMB_001.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMB_001.text: I'll break the enemy's ranks. After me!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMB_003.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMB_003.text: I see our path to victory!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMB_005.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMB_005.text: They'll pay for what they did!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_CO_001.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_CO_001.text: Breakin' limits is why I'm a champion!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_RESULT_001.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_RESULT_001.text: I train hard and never compromise.

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_HERO_001.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_HERO_001.text: The hero of the story? Gotta be me, bud.

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_HERO_002.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_HERO_002.text: I still got spirits to find.

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_0.text: This here's why I lived my life guided by the Emerald Wave.

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_1.text: Never thought I'd end up fighting for a witch!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_2.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_2.text: Never thought I'd end up fighting for a witch!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_3.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_3.text: Never thought I'd end up fighting for a witch!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_4.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_4.text: Never thought I'd end up fighting for some fella called the Dismal King!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_5.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_5.text: Never thought I'd end up fighting for some fella called the Dismal King!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_6.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_6.text: Never thought I'd end up fighting for the Union States!

EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_7.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_BT_TSUNA_COMM_003_7.text: So I'll get to hear you sing? Can't wait for that, bud.

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_HERO_001.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_HERO_001.text: My Witchterms are gonna be a breeze!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_HERO_002.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_HERO_002.text:
Another test? (Ameya)
Can't wait to see everyone! (Yumeha)

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_HERO_003.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_HERO_003.text: I'll show you what a witch can do!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_0.text: Good thing you've got a witch as a friend, huh?

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_1.text: I'm a witch of Pulchra, and I shine bright no matter WHERE I am!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_2.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_2.text: Never thought I'd be able to enjoy my magic like this. Thanks!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_3.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_3.text: You're about to see one pissed-off witch!

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_4.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_4.text: Good thing you've got a witch as a friend, huh?

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_5.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_5.text: Good thing you've got a witch as a friend, huh?

EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_6.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_BT_AMAYA_COMM_003_6.text: Good thing you've got a witch as a friend, huh?

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_HERO_001.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_HERO_001.text: Have you the right to control the Dismal King?

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_HERO_002.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_HERO_002.text: Long have I waited, my friend.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_HERO_003.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_HERO_003.text: Let us walk the path of darkness as one.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_0.text: The darkness of the Conjoined Worlds is unfathomable.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_1.text: The darkness of the Conjoined Worlds is nigh unfathomable.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_2.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_2.text: The darkness of the Conjoined Worlds is nigh unfathomable.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_3.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_3.text: The darkness of the Conjoined Worlds is nigh unfathomable.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_4.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_4.text: Do not think you can control the power of darkness!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_5.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_5.text: Shall I demonstrate the power of darkness?

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_6.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_6.text: The darkness of the Conjoined Worlds is nigh unfathomable.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_7.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_BT_SIUGNAS_COMM_003_7.text: Your song shall surely awaken new darkness!

EV_TEXT_BT_BAF_HERO_001.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_BAF_HERO_001.text:
It's my first jobâ€”I'm pretty nervous. (Formina)
Beats a trip to the Hells, at least. (Bonnie)

EV_TEXT_BT_BAF_HERO_002.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_BAF_HERO_002.text:
I'll make a real show of it this time! (Bonnie)
I'll do my best to keep up. (Formina)

EV_TEXT_BT_BAF_HERO_003.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_BAF_HERO_003.text:
Officer Franklyn, moving out! (Formina)
Officer Blair, movin' out! (Bonnie)

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_PARTY_001.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_PARTY_001.text: I'm an excellent shot, which always seems to surprise people.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_002.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_002.text: Don't worry. I'm sure I can handle a real fight.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_0.text: You will not decide the fate of the world!

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_1.text: You will not decide the fate of the world!

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_4.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_4.text: You will not decide the fate of the world!

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_5.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_5.text: You will not decide the fate of the world!

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_6.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_6.text: Our fate is our own to decide! That's how we do things!

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_7.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_003_7.text: I haven't been to a concert in so long... Eeeeee, Diva!

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_008.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_008.text: This is a waste of time.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_009.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_009.text: I hope to see commensurate rewards for this.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_010.text: I won't be happy unless this pays handsomely.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_012.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMM_012.text: This is a rare thing, Bonnie.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMB_001.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_COMB_001.text: Cooperation will give us an edge.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_FINISH_003.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_FINISH_003.text: That may have been a bit much.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_RESULT_004.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_RESULT_004.text: I suppose my perspective has changed.

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_RESULT_009.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_RESULT_009.text: I can't believe...this is how it ends...

EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_RESULT_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_BT_FORMINA_RESULT_010.text: I can't believe...this is how it ends...

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_PARTY_001.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_PARTY_001.text: Bare-handed or armed to the teeth, soldiers like me can do it all.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_0.text: No sense in tryin' to make the world dance to your tune!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_1.text: No sense in tryin' to make the world dance to your tune!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_2.speaker: Bonnie_Blair

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_3.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_3.text: No sense in tryin' to make the world dance to your tune!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_4.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_4.text: No sense in tryin' to make the world dance to your tune!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_5.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_5.text: No sense in tryin' to make the world dance to your tune!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_6.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_003_6.text: I know things in this world ain't all sunshine and rainbows.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_008.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_008.text: An easy win's the best win.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_009.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_009.text: Wish we could have an easier go of this.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_010.text: I prefer to run from tough fellers if I have the choice.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_014.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMM_014.text: I got it from here, Formina!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_INSPI_001.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_INSPI_001.text: I ain't seen nothin' like this before.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_INSPI_002.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_INSPI_002.text: Hoo, this here's a big one!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_SS_001.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_SS_001.text: I'll take care of this myself!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_SS_002.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_SS_002.text: You just leave this to me.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMB_003.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMB_003.text: Let's put a bow on it!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMB_005.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_COMB_005.text: Now you've gone and done it!

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_FINISH_003.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_FINISH_003.text: It's all good so long as we win.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_DEAD_001.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_DEAD_001.text: Boy, I sure screwed that one up.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_RESULT_009.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_RESULT_009.text: Guess it had to happen sometime.

EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_RESULT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_BT_BONNIE_RESULT_010.text: Guess it had to happen sometime.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_PARTY_001.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_PARTY_001.text: My serial number is D05-72314. I am known as Songstress Diva No. 5.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_002.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_002.text: Can I be of use to you?

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_003_0.text: Aye, I'm a part of this world, same as you.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_003_1.text: Aye, I'm a part of this world, same as you.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_003_7.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_003_7.text: All functions normal. I should be able to sing.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_008.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_008.text: The numbers say this will be easy.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_009.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_009.text: The numbers say this will be standard.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_010.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_010.text: The numbers say this will be difficult.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_011.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMM_011.text: We're doing brilliantly. Well done, everyone.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_SET_001.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_SET_001.text: With BP costs reduced, we can attack more efficiently.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_SS_001.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_SS_001.text: I cannae do this on my own!

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMB_003.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMB_003.text: The enemy's on the brink of defeat!

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMB_005.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_COMB_005.text: We must make the most of this situation.

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_RESULT_004.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_RESULT_004.text: This would be called a 'concept,' yes?

EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_RESULT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_BT_DIVA_RESULT_010.text: No, loves! You have to restart!

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_003_0.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_003_1.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_003_1.text: Behold the fruits of my training!

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_003_2.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_003_2.text: We are kugutsuâ€”we have but to follow.

EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_003_7.speaker: Musashi_Kugutu
EV_TEXT_BT_MUSASHI_COMM_003_7.text: Fear not, for your training has made you a diva!

EV_TEXT_BT_SUKUNE_COMM_003_7.speaker: Sukune_Kugutu

EV_TEXT_BT_BOU_COMM_003_7.text: What a song! Make sure that piece of trash hears it too!

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_0.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_0.text: Don't let your guard down until it's over.

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_1.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_1.text: I'll always be by your side, Ameya.

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_2.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_2.text: I'm with you to the end, Ameya.

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_3.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_3.text: I KNEW something was off! What kind of goddess are you, anyway!?

EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_4.speaker: LoLo_Battle
EV_TEXT_BT_LOLO_COMM_003_4.text: Don't let your guard down until it's over.

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_0.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_0.text: It seems my choice was not a mistake after all.

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_1.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_1.text: A squire can still fight for Pulchra!

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_2.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_2.text: Lady Ameya stands astride the world, and I'm proud to be her squire!

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_3.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_3.text: Had I been there originally, none of this would have happened!

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_4.speaker: Shinobu_Kato

EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_7.speaker: Shinobu_Kato
EV_TEXT_BT_SHINOBU_COMM_003_7.text: I've little interest in music, but your singing is special. Have confidence!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_0.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_0.text: Come on, let's make this fun!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_1.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_1.text: The Goddess of Sorcery is with you! ...Or a copy, at least.

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_2.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_2.text: How should a copy act in this situation?

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_3.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_3.text: What's going to happen to this poor copy!?

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_4.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_4.text: Come on, let's make this fun!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_5.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_5.text: Come on, let's make this fun!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_6.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_6.text: Come on, let's make this fun!

EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_7.speaker: Macha_Copy
EV_TEXT_BT_MACHA_C_COMM_003_7.text: You like singing, right? Well then, I know you can do it!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_0.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_0.text: Our valor shines upon this battlefield!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_1.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_1.text: Our valor shines upon this battlefield!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_2.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_2.text: Is there meaning in this fight?

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_3.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_3.text: Perhaps this is where I'll find my justice.

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_4.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_4.text: Truth dwells within me! I've no doubts about fighting alongside the Dismal King!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_5.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_5.text: It's time I become a true warrior. I stand beside the Dismal King with justice in my heart!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_6.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_6.text: Our valor shines upon this battlefield!

EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_7.speaker: Brave_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_BRAVE_COMM_003_7.text: I don't know the specifics, but I DO know I want to hear you sing again!

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_0.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_0.text: Our terminus, eh? I suppose I ought take up the challenge.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_1.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_1.text: Our terminus, eh? I suppose I ought take up the challenge.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_3.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_3.text: I fear you must answer for what you've done.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_4.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_4.text: Our journey is one of freedomâ€”do not interfere.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_5.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_5.text: To be amidst a clash of light and dark... How fascinating!

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_6.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_6.text: Our terminus, eh? I suppose I ought take up the challenge.

EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_7.speaker: Philosopher_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_PHILO_COMM_003_7.text: Your singing is simply wondrous! And I don't give up compliments easily!

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_0.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_0.text: Death cares not who they are.

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_1.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_1.text: Death cares not who they are.

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_4.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_4.text: No need to think about who needs to die here.

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_5.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_5.text: I seek to slay the light within the dark.

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_6.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_6.text: Death cares not who they are.

EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_7.speaker: Killer_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_KILLER_COMM_003_7.text: Let me hear you sing again.

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_0.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_0.text: Last fight, no fright! Win or it's good night!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_1.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_1.text: Last fight, no fright! Win or it's good night!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_2.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_2.text: Woah, hey! You sure we're okay?

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_3.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_3.text: We're stronger for longerâ€”you're a weak little freak!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_5.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_5.text: Hey there, mates! We'll get on great! And if this is the end, I'll see ya again!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_6.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_6.text: Last fight, no fright! Win or it's good night!

EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_7.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_ILMUR_COMM_003_7.text: Sing it! Bring it! Take this monster's neck and wring it!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_0.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_0.text: I've been trainin' for this FOREVER! Here comes the champ!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_1.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_1.text: I've been trainin' for this FOREVER! Here comes the champ!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_2.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_2.text: Don't matter who I'm dealing with, so long as I get better.

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_3.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_3.text: Can't wait to see how I fare against a god!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_4.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_4.text: If I win here, I'll reach new levels of greatness!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_5.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_5.text: Nothing wrong with fightin' to protect the darkness!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_6.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_6.text: I've been trainin' for this FOREVER! Here comes the champ!

EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_7.speaker: Champion_Einherjar
EV_TEXT_BT_CHAMP_COMM_003_7.text: Hard work never lets ya downâ€”and I know how hard ya worked!

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_PARTY_001.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_PARTY_001.text: The Albion National Extradimensional Exploratory Task Force ventures forth!

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_002.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_002.text: Right then, everyone! Let's give it our best!

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_0.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_0.text: Heh heh. I find my being here ever so curious.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_1.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_1.text: Heh heh. I find my being here ever so curious.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_2.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_2.text: Heh heh. I find my being here ever so curious.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_3.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_3.text: Heh heh. I find my being here ever so curious.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_4.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_4.text: Heh heh. I find my being here ever so curious.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_5.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_5.text: Heh heh. I find my being here ever so curious.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_6.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_6.text: Heh heh. I find my being here ever so curious.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_7.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_003_7.text: Heh heh. I find my being here ever so curious.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_008.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_008.text: I'm not 'on the team,' per se, so don't count on me for things.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_009.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_009.text: As I've said, I'm not 'on the team,' so don't count on me.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_010.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_010.text: I'm truly of little use, so best I not be 'on the team.'

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_011.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_011.text: I truly AM amazing at putting a team together, aren't I?

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_012.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMM_012.text: No need to overdo it now!

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_SET_001.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_SET_001.text: And what, pray tell, is this about?

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_SS_001.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_SS_001.text: Is it quite all right for me to stand out like this?

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_SS_002.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_SS_002.text: A commander may be bold in all things!

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMB_003.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMB_003.text: I think we might win the day!

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMB_005.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_COMB_005.text: Well now, that's a right mess.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_CO_001.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_CO_001.text: I get to go again, do I?

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_CO_002.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_CO_002.text: I do believe this is what they call 'camaraderie.'

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_FINISH_001.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_FINISH_001.text: Oh ho! We won the day!

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_FINISH_004.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_FINISH_004.text: Such twists are how we win.

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_RESULT_001_B.text: My, my! Quite extensive growth here!

EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_RESULT_002.speaker: Constantine
EV_TEXT_BT_CONSTANTINE_RESULT_002.text: The lot of you really do need to PROTECT your commander!

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_PARTY_001.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_PARTY_001.text: I'll take no questions about what's under the suit!

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_0.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_0.text: Serious situations aren't exactly my cup of tea.

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_1.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_1.text: Serious situations aren't exactly my cup of tea.

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_3.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_3.text: Hold up now. This isn't funny.

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_4.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_4.text: Serious situations aren't exactly my cup of tea.

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_5.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_5.text: Serious situations aren't exactly my cup of tea.

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_6.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_003_6.text: Serious situations aren't exactly my cup of tea.

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_008.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_008.text: Doesn't seem like they'll be all that useful.

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_009.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_009.text: Time for naughty children to pay!

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_010.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMM_010.text: I'll chew 'em up and spit 'em out!

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMB_002.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_COMB_002.text: C'mon, everyone! Give it your all!

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_CO_002.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_CO_002.text: Another one? Don't mind if I do!

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_FINISH_005.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_FINISH_005.text: Wednesday's gonna wrap this one up!

EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_RESULT_002.speaker: Wednesday
EV_TEXT_BT_WEDNESDAY_RESULT_002.text: That even hurt through the suit...

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_PARTY_001.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_PARTY_001.text: Flowers wither after they bloom, so don't get your hopes up.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_002.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_002.text: Perhaps fighting will make my flower bloom.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_0.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_0.text: My blood actually might bloom if I fight here.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_1.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_1.text: My blood actually might bloom if I fight here.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_3.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_3.text: I will never forget this treatment.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_4.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_4.text: My blood actually might bloom if I fight here.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_5.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_5.text: My blood actually might bloom if I fight here.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_6.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_6.text: My blood actually might bloom if I fight here.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_7.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_003_7.text: May your singing echo on to the Maiden's Garden!

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_008.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_008.text: How pathetic... No need to take this seriously.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_009.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_009.text: Nothing out of the ordinaryâ€”and oh, how I hate that word.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_010.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_010.text: What a powerful foe... Can't someone take my place?

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_011.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMM_011.text: Best to just give in to the moment!

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_OA_001.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_OA_001.text: This looks like someone else's technique...

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_SS_001.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_SS_001.text: A stage like this for a single flower?

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_SS_002.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_SS_002.text: Time to stand out a bit.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMB_005.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_COMB_005.text: I'm the type to hold a grudge.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_CO_002.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_CO_002.text: I could do this all day.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_RESULT_002.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_RESULT_002.text: It seems I was in quiescence for a moment.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_RESULT_005.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_RESULT_005.text: It feels as though I've matured.

EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_RESULT_010.speaker: Blath
EV_TEXT_BT_BLATH_RESULT_010.text: We'll have to start afresh from seeds.

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_PARTY_001.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_PARTY_001.text: Sellsword though I am, my soul is still my own.

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_002.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_002.text: Surveying worlds can be an altogether horrid experience.

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_0.text: I stand against those who would steal our freedom!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_1.text: I stand against those who would steal our freedom!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_3.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_3.text: I stand against those who would steal our freedom!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_4.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_4.text: I stand against those who would steal our freedom!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_5.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_5.text: I stand against those who would steal our freedom!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_6.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_6.text: I stand against those who would steal our freedom!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_7.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_003_7.text: Good singing can steel the spirits, and we need such now!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_010.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_010.text: A powerful foeâ€”but I will be victorious!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_011.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMM_011.text: Ah, but I do enjoy this!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_SS_001.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_SS_001.text: We always fight to the last! Such is our pride!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_SS_002.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_SS_002.text: See now the pride of a warrior!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMB_005.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_COMB_005.text: Your pain won't be for nothing!

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_FINISH_002.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_FINISH_002.text: Have you no pride of your own?

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_RESULT_001_B.text: Complacency is the enemy of growth.

EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_RESULT_010.speaker: Boudica
EV_TEXT_BT_BOUDICA_RESULT_010.text: Stand and fight, all of you!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_PARTY_001.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_PARTY_001.text: The witches of Pulchra are frightful indeed.

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_002.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_002.text: Time for a little witchy magic.

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_0.text: We were destined to come here together.

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_1.text: Pulchra may have its quirks, but I love it all the same. I'd never let you harm it!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_3.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_3.text: Being a deity sure hasn't improved your ability to tell right from wrong!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_4.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_4.text: Pulchra may have its quirks, but I love it all the same. I'd never let you harm it!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_5.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_5.text: Pulchra may have its quirks, but I love it all the same. I'd never let you harm it!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_6.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_6.text: Pulchra may have its quirks, but I love it all the same. I'd never let you harm it!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_7.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_003_7.text: This is no time to lose your nerve! You CAN sing! I just know it!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_010.text: Tough fights like this are when witches shine!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_011.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_011.text: Let's put this baby to bed!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_012.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_COMM_012.text: Hey! What's going on over there!?

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_INSPI_002.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_INSPI_002.text: Okay, come on. I ONLY need magic!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_OA_001.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_OA_001.text: I could work with this, sure.

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_SS_001.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_SS_001.text: I'll finish this like a witch: with style!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_SS_002.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_SS_002.text: You want captivating? 'Cause you're gonna get it!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_FINISH_002.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_FINISH_002.text: Would you please just DIE already!?

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_FINISH_004.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_FINISH_004.text: Bet you've never seen this before!

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_RESULT_001_B.text: Here comes the applause! ...Aaany second now.

EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_RESULT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_BT_LITA_RESULT_010.text: No... This can't be. It CAN'T!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_PARTY_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_PARTY_001.text: I want to see more worlds!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_002.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_002.text: I wonder if I can do this...

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_0.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_0.text: THIS is why I left Pulchra behind!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_1.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_1.text: THIS is why I left Pulchra behind!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_2.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_2.text: Did power really change you this much!?

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_4.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_4.text: THIS is why I left Pulchra behind!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_003_5.speaker: YellowWitchWillma

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_009.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_COMM_009.text: No matter what, I'll still fight like a witch of the yellow.

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_INSPI_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_INSPI_001.text: I think I'm on to something!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_INSPI_002.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_INSPI_002.text: I bet this will be GREAT!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_OA_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_OA_001.text: No witch wants to be boring and mediocre.

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_SS_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_SS_001.text: I can do this! I know it!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_DEAD_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_DEAD_001.text: I knew I was no good...

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_RESULT_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_RESULT_001.text: I've got a little more faith in myself now!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_RESULT_001_B.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_N_RESULT_001_B.text: I think I can get even better!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_PARTY_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_PARTY_001.text: It's okay for me to go on living as a golem. I really believe that!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_003_0.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_003_0.text: What I am doesn't matter now.

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_003_1.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_003_1.text: THIS is I why left Pulchra behind!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_003_2.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_003_2.text: Did power really change you this much!?

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_003_4.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_003_4.text: What I am doesn't matter now.

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_009.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_009.text: You can still count on me to help out!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_010.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_COMM_010.text: This is gonna be tough! I can tell!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_INSPI_002.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_INSPI_002.text: I bet this will be GREAT!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_OA_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_OA_001.text: I'm a little different from your average person!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_SS_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_SS_001.text: I can do this! I know it!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_FINISH_003.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_FINISH_003.text: Not bad for a golem girl!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_FINISH_004.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_FINISH_004.text: I can do this so long as I have all of you.

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_DEAD_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_DEAD_001.text: How could a golem like me possibly succeed?

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_RESULT_001.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_RESULT_001.text: I've got a little more faith in myself now!

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_RESULT_001_B.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_RESULT_001_B.text: This golem girl isn't half-bad, huh!?

EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_RESULT_010.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
EV_TEXT_BT_WILLMA_G_RESULT_010.text: This only happened because you brought a golem like me along...

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_PARTY_001.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_PARTY_001.text: I don't have to serve anyone anymore, right? This is what it is to be free?

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_002.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_002.text: I hope the Watcher values my skills.

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_0.text: Everyone needs an assassin. I'll show you just how effective my skills are!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_1.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_1.text: Everyone needs an assassin. I'll show you just how effective my skills are!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_3.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_3.text: Such terrible treatment deserves a suitable punishment!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_4.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_4.text: Everyone needs an assassin. I'll show you just how effective my skills are!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_5.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_5.text: Everyone needs an assassin. I'll show you just how effective my skills are!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_6.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_003_6.text: Everyone needs an assassin. I'll show you just how effective my skills are!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_008.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_008.text: A professional takes every battle seriously.

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_010.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_010.text: My new life means nothing if I can't beat a foe like this.

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_011.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_COMM_011.text: We have the enemy on the back foot.

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_SET_001.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_SET_001.text: I'll cut you in the dark!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_INSPI_002.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_INSPI_002.text: Ha ha ha! What a technique!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_OA_001.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_OA_001.text: This is what freedom gets you!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_SS_001.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_SS_001.text: A bit flashy for an assassin, but it'll have to do.

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_FINISH_006.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_FINISH_006.text: Now THIS is a power I can get behind...

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_RESULT_001_B.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_RESULT_001_B.text: I no longer have anything holding me back!

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_RESULT_002.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_RESULT_002.text: It's a thin line between freedom and pain.

EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_RESULT_010.speaker: SquireAssasin
EV_TEXT_BT_SQUIRE_RESULT_010.text: What kind of squire can't support his allies?

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_PARTY_001.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_PARTY_001.text: I'll always support you, Master! Command me as you see fit!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_002.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_002.text: I'm so happy to be helping you, Master!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_0.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_0.text: I'm finally together with my master... As if I'd let you screw that up!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_1.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_1.text: I'll never let you mess with my master!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_2.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_2.text: I'll never let you mess with my master!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_3.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_3.text: I'll never let you mess with my master!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_5.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_5.text: I'll never let you mess with my master!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_6.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_003_6.text: I'll never let you mess with my master!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_009.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_009.text: An enemy of my master is an enemy of mine!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_010.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_010.text: I've got a real bad feeling about this.

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_011.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMM_011.text: We'll never fail so long as you lead us, Master!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_OA_001.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_OA_001.text: This maid's gonna clean up now!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMB_005.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_COMB_005.text: I'LL FLAY THE FLESH FROM YOUR BONES!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_CO_002.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_CO_002.text: One more go! One more go!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_RESULT_001.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_RESULT_001.text: I'm gonna be even MORE helpful!

EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_RESULT_002.speaker: Dolores
EV_TEXT_BT_DOLORES_RESULT_002.text: Man, does that ever piss me off!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_PARTY_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_PARTY_001.text: I couldn't be refusin' yer request!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_002.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_002.text: There's more to strength than just lookin' tough.

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_0.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_0.text: Yar, pirates were easier to deal with! I may have made a poor decision...

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_1.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_1.text: Yar, pirates were easier to deal with! I may have made a poor decision...

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_2.speaker: Ivar

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_4.text: Yar, pirates were easier to deal with! I may have made a poor decision...

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_5.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_5.text: Yar, pirates were easier to deal with! I may have made a poor decision...

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_6.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_003_6.text: Yar, pirates were easier to deal with! I may have made a poor decision...

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_005.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_005.text: Yar, but that one be lookin' delicious.

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_006.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_006.text: I'll be cookin' ye to perfection!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_009.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_009.text: Never be underestimatin' a man of the sea!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_010.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMM_010.text: I be Ivar of the Mare Nostrum!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_SET_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_SET_001.text: Here be the spirit of a sailor.

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_INSPI_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_INSPI_001.text: Tis the guidance of Deus Maris!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_INSPI_002.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_INSPI_002.text: Me thinks I found some treasure!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_OA_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_OA_001.text: A man needs his wits to survive on the seas!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_SS_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_SS_001.text: If ye don't work, ye don't eat!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMB_002.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_COMB_002.text: I'll send ye to the fathoms!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_CO_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_CO_001.text: We ain't done yet, ye landlubbers!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_FINISH_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_FINISH_001.text: Ye gutless son of a cod!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_FINISH_002.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_FINISH_002.text: Show a little more grit, ye sorry barnacle scraper!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_FINISH_003.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_FINISH_003.text: This be what ye get when ye cross a man of the sea!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_FINISH_006.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_FINISH_006.text: Don't wanna be relyin' on power like this, but...

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_DEAD_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_DEAD_001.text: Tis naught but a return to the sea...

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_RESULT_001.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_RESULT_001.text: Hoist the sails of me heart!

EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_RESULT_002.speaker: Ivar
EV_TEXT_BT_IVAR_RESULT_002.text: Back to swabbin' the deck for me...

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_PARTY_001.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_PARTY_001.text: I need to find my way on this strange new sea...

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_002.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_002.text: Can a guardian still fight on such distant waves?

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_0.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_0.text: Let us submit to the guidance of Deus Maris!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_1.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_1.text: Let us submit to the guidance of Deus Maris!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_2.speaker: Azure

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_3.speaker: Azure

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_4.speaker: Azure

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_5.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_5.text: Let us submit to the guidance of Deus Maris!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_6.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_6.text: Let us submit to the guidance of Deus Maris!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_7.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_003_7.text: I departed the Mare Nostrum to hear such a song!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_008.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_008.text: Come to be slaughtered, have you?

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_010.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_010.text: I'll end anyone who gets in my way!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_011.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMM_011.text: I'll keelhaul you to hell and back!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_INSPI_001.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_INSPI_001.text: This is such a strange feeling...

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_INSPI_002.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_INSPI_002.text: I'll teach you to know fear.

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMB_003.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_COMB_003.text: No one escapes Azure. No one!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_FINISH_001.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_FINISH_001.text: Even pirates put up a better fight.

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_FINISH_003.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_FINISH_003.text: This has been fun, but it's time to end it.

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_FINISH_004.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_FINISH_004.text: You'll feel this in your bones!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_FINISH_006.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_FINISH_006.text: A girl could get used to this!

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_RESULT_002.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_RESULT_002.text: Death is an old friend by now...

EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_RESULT_010.speaker: Azure
EV_TEXT_BT_AZURE_RESULT_010.text: Is my journey across the outer seas already over!?

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_PARTY_001.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_PARTY_001.text: As a priest of the Order, I bear witness to what lies beyond the Kosmos!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_002.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_002.text: What fun places await outside the Kosmos?

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_003_0.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_003_0.text: The Order of Leukos is charged with protecting the Kosmos. You cannot stand against us!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_003_1.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_003_1.text: The Order of Leukos is charged with protecting the Kosmos. You cannot stand against us!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_003_6.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_003_6.text: The Order of Leukos is charged with protecting the Kosmos. You cannot stand against us!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_003_7.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_003_7.text: Sing us a divine message from the Kosmos!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_008.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_008.text: Remain calm. This foe is of little concern.

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_009.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_009.text: A malignancy? I shall excise it.

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_010.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_010.text: Mmm... This is a powerful foe.

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_011.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMM_011.text: If you're going to flee, now's the time.

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_SET_001.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_SET_001.text: This is the power of the Kosmos!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_SS_002.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_SS_002.text: Though defense is my specialty, I do as I must!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMB_005.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_COMB_005.text: Your sacrifice will not be in vain!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_CO_001.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_CO_001.text: This is a divine message from the Kosmos!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_FINISH_003.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_FINISH_003.text: Malignancy eliminated! None shall fall to sickness this day!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_FINISH_005.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_FINISH_005.text: Employing one sickness to cure another!

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_RESULT_001_B.text: The expected outcome for a priest.

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_RESULT_006.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_RESULT_006.text: Growth is a natural part of life.

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_RESULT_007.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_RESULT_007.text: Is this what mitosis feels like...?

EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_RESULT_010.speaker: Byaku
EV_TEXT_BT_BYAKU_RESULT_010.text: Was I truly powerless to stop this...?

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_PARTY_001.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_PARTY_001.text: Guess I can stop calling you a foreign body now...

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_COMM_003_0.text: I'll carry this loadâ€”it's what I do!
