EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_COMM_003_6.text: I'll carry this loadâ€”it's what I do!

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_COMM_010.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_COMM_010.text: Ugh. I don't like this at all...

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_SET_001.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_SET_001.text: Being a good carrier's all about efficiency.

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_SS_002.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_SS_002.text: I could get used to this!

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_COMB_001.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_COMB_001.text: All part of being a carrier.

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_RESULT_002.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_RESULT_002.text: Oof... That probably could've gone better.

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_RESULT_005.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_RESULT_005.text: Growth's the most natural process there is.

EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_RESULT_006.speaker: Erytheia
EV_TEXT_BT_ERYTHEIA_RESULT_006.text: Feels like I just got a transfusion!

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_PARTY_001.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_PARTY_001.text: The Flame Tribe answers your call!

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_0.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_0.text: Is this the end of our journey, Soul Voyager?

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_1.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_1.text: Is this the end of our journey, Soul Voyager?

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_2.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_2.text: Is this the end of our journey, Soul Voyager?

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_3.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_3.text: Is this the end of our journey, Soul Voyager?

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_4.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_4.text: Is this the end of our journey, Soul Voyager?

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_5.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_5.text: Is this the end of our journey, Soul Voyager?

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_6.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_6.text: Is this the end of our journey, Soul Voyager?

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_7.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_003_7.text: Light a fire in the heart!

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_008.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_008.text: You foes hardly fire me up.

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_010.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMM_010.text: This is the fiery passion I seek!

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMB_005.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_COMB_005.text: Your strength shall be my blade!

EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_FINISH_001.speaker: Nitram
EV_TEXT_BT_NITRAM_FINISH_001.text: Try to make it more exciting next time!

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_PARTY_001.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_PARTY_001.text: The Wave Tribe answers your call.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_0.text: You have my gratitude for bringing me to this land, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_1.text: You have my gratitude for bringing me to this land, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_2.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_2.text: You have my gratitude for bringing me to this land, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_3.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_3.text: You have my gratitude for bringing me to this land, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_4.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_4.text: You have my gratitude for bringing me to this land, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_5.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_5.text: You have my gratitude for bringing me to this land, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_6.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_003_6.text: You have my gratitude for bringing me to this land, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_008.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_008.text: They say even the weakest of beings can bite, but...

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_009.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_009.text: We've a good chance for victory here.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_010.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_010.text: Calm is the key to survival.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_011.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMM_011.text: I'll go with the flow and end this.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_INSPI_002.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_INSPI_002.text: Water can also be a blade!

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_OA_001.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_OA_001.text: I give myself over to the flow.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMB_001.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMB_001.text: I will forge a path for all.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMB_002.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMB_002.text: Come! Join me on this journey!

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMB_003.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_COMB_003.text: We'll dash the enemy upon the rocks.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_CO_001.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_CO_001.text: This raging flow will not be stopped!

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_FINISH_003.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_FINISH_003.text: Only the strong have survived this day.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_FINISH_004.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_FINISH_004.text: This should provide some good experience.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_RESULT_001_B.text: A rising tide lifts all boats!

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_RESULT_002.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_RESULT_002.text: I shall rise again from this.

EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_RESULT_010.speaker: Atihana
EV_TEXT_BT_ATIHANA_RESULT_010.text: No! It's too soon to return to the water!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_PARTY_001.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_PARTY_001.text: The Gale Tribe responds to your call.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_0.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_0.text: Good things happen when you entrust yourself to the wind, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_1.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_1.text: Good things happen when you entrust yourself to the wind, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_2.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_2.text: Good things happen when you entrust yourself to the wind, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_3.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_3.text: Good things happen when you entrust yourself to the wind, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_4.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_4.text: Good things happen when you entrust yourself to the wind, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_5.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_5.text: Good things happen when you entrust yourself to the wind, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_6.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_6.text: Good things happen when you entrust yourself to the wind, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_7.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_003_7.text: The wind shall carry your song!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_009.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMM_009.text: This is no time to be running in place.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_INSPI_002.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_INSPI_002.text: Take aim during a lull in the wind!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_OA_001.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_OA_001.text: Only I could do such a thing.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_SS_001.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_SS_001.text: Float like a bird, sting like a bee!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_SS_002.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_SS_002.text: You wish to see my grace once more?

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMB_001.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_COMB_001.text: Follow the guidance of the wind!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_FINISH_002.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_FINISH_002.text: That was goodâ€”but we can't get complacent.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_FINISH_003.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_FINISH_003.text: That took far more effort than I expected!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_RESULT_001_B.text: I rode well upon the winds!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_RESULT_002.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_RESULT_002.text: Did I let my guard down...?

EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_RESULT_010.speaker: Nahoj
EV_TEXT_BT_NAHOJ_RESULT_010.text: Soar back to me, my friends!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_PARTY_001.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_PARTY_001.text: The Forest Tribe responds to your call.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_002.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_002.text: I'll crush all who get in my way!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_0.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_0.text: I pray you will take me back to the forest someday, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_1.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_1.text: I pray you will take me back to the forest someday, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_2.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_2.text: I pray you will take me back to the forest someday, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_3.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_3.text: I pray you will take me back to the forest someday, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_4.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_4.text: I pray you will take me back to the forest someday, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_5.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_5.text: I pray you will take me back to the forest someday, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_6.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_6.text: I pray you will take me back to the forest someday, Soul Voyager.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_7.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_003_7.text: I hear the song of the forest in this place!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_009.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_009.text: My fist is strong as oak!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_011.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMM_011.text: The land is on our side!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_INSPI_002.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_INSPI_002.text: I surrender to the voice of the forest!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_OA_001.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_OA_001.text: The blessing of the woods is my strength!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_SS_001.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_SS_001.text: Let's see if they can dodge THIS!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMB_001.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_COMB_001.text: The very earth is our ally!

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_RESULT_001.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_RESULT_001.text: I feel the breath of the forest.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_RESULT_001_B.text: Perhaps my way of training is just different.

EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_RESULT_002.speaker: Irbas
EV_TEXT_BT_IRBAS_RESULT_002.text: Only by getting knocked down can one grow stronger.

EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_PARTY_001.speaker: Gruman_Mole
EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_PARTY_001.text: I'm off to find something tasty!

EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_COMM_003_7.speaker: Gruman_Mole
EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_COMM_003_7.text: You can do it, singing lady!

EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_COMM_009.speaker: Gruman_Mole
EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_COMM_009.text: That might make a good meal.

EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_SS_002.speaker: Gruman_Mole
EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_SS_002.text: Everybody look at what I can do!

EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_FINISH_001.speaker: Gruman_Mole
EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_FINISH_001.text: That was boo-ring! I wanna keep playing!

EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_FINISH_005.speaker: Gruman_Mole
EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_FINISH_005.text: I can do it too! Hyah!

EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_RESULT_001.speaker: Gruman_Mole
EV_TEXT_BT_GRUMAN_RESULT_001.text: Tell me how great I did! C'mon, tell me!

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_PARTY_001.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_PARTY_001.text: Outside is probably more fun than middle management.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMM_008.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMM_008.text: Don't start a fight you can't win.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMM_009.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMM_009.text: My combat abilities are being tested.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMM_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMM_010.text: You guys have crazy stuff in Outside.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMM_011.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMM_011.text: Let's hurry up and end this.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_SET_001.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_SET_001.text: So now's my chance, I guess?

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_SS_001.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_SS_001.text: Wait, I have to do this alone?

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_SS_002.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_SS_002.text: I suppose working on your own isn't so bad...

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMB_001.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMB_001.text: Uh, so am I first here?

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMB_003.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMB_003.text: Time to put a pin in this.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMB_005.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_COMB_005.text: I think I can work with this.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_FINISH_001.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_FINISH_001.text: I told you not to take on hopeless fights.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_DEAD_001.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_DEAD_001.text: I'm gonna get fired for this.

EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Gold_SubManager
EV_TEXT_BT_GOLD_RESULT_001_B.text: Maybe this is a sign I should try harder?

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_PARTY_001.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_PARTY_001.text: I'll help out however I can!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_002.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_002.text: Scarecrows don't really know how to fight.

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_0.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_0.text: That's a crow, right? I'm gonna scare it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_1.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_1.text: That's a crow, right? I'm gonna scare it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_2.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_2.text: That's a crow, right? I'm gonna scare it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_3.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_3.text: That's a crow, right? I'm gonna scare it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_4.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_4.text: That's a crow, right? I'm gonna scare it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_5.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_5.text: That's a crow, right? I'm gonna scare it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_6.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_6.text: That's a crow, right? I'm gonna scare it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_7.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_003_7.text: All the scarecrows love you, Diva!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_008.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_008.text: An easy fight? I don't know what that means.

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_009.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_009.text: A normal fight? I don't know what that means.

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_010.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_010.text: A tough fight? I don't know what that means.

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_011.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_COMM_011.text: We've got the advantage? We've got the advantage!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_INSPI_001.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_INSPI_001.text: Feels like my head's gonna catch on fire!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_SS_001.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_SS_001.text: Anybody mind if I just stand here?

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_SS_002.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_SS_002.text: Scarecrows are SUPPOSED to stand out!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_001.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_001.text: So THAT'S an easy fight... Got it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_002.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_002.text: So THAT'S a normal fight... Got it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_003.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_003.text: So THAT'S a tough fight... Got it!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_004.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_004.text: Turns out Scarecrow Style is a thing!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_006.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_FINISH_006.text: I am a mere scarecrow no longer!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_DEAD_001.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_DEAD_001.text: A scarecrow that doesn't move is... Well, a scarecrow.

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_RESULT_001.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_RESULT_001.text: Sure, stuff more things inside me!

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_RESULT_002.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_RESULT_002.text: Eh, whatever. I'm a Scarecrow, remember?

EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_RESULT_010.speaker: Scarecrow
EV_TEXT_BT_SCARECROW_RESULT_010.text: It's okay. Scarecrow is always watching.

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_PARTY_001.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_PARTY_001.text: This is what Mom would've wanted.

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_002.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_002.text: Is this a trial from the god of the Imeru?

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_0.text: This is for you, Soyay. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_1.text: This is for you, Soyay. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_2.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_2.text: This is for you, Soyay. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_3.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_3.text: This is for you, Soyay. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_4.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_4.text: This is for you, Soyay. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_5.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_5.text: This is for you, Soyay. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_6.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_6.text: This is for you, Soyay. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_7.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_003_7.text: *sniff* Oh man, I think I'm gonna cry...

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_008.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_008.text: Oh, I think we can handle this.

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_009.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_009.text: You wouldn't make me do anything too tough, right?

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_010.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_010.text: I know I'm being tested, but yeesh!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_011.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMM_011.text: Got a good thing going here!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_SET_001.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_SET_001.text: Is this the will of the god of the Imeru?

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_INSPI_002.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_INSPI_002.text: This must be the Soyay's guidance.

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_OA_001.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_OA_001.text: Gonna call this one Imeru style!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMB_005.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_COMB_005.text: I will carry out your will.

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_FINISH_002.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_FINISH_002.text: This trial was WAY too hard!

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_FINISH_003.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_FINISH_003.text: This was the kind of battle my mother fought alone...

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_FINISH_006.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_FINISH_006.text: What kind of power IS this!?

EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_RESULT_010.speaker: Nana
EV_TEXT_BT_NANA_RESULT_010.text: I can't do anything on my own.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_002.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_002.text: Commencing the collection of live combat data.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_0.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_0.text: I'll apply new tactics and overcome the situation.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_1.text: I'll apply new tactics and overcome the situation.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_2.text: I'll apply new tactics and overcome the situation.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_5.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_5.text: I'll apply new tactics and overcome the situation.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_6.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_6.text: I'll apply new tactics and overcome the situation.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_7.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_003_7.text: Sing. I would like to study your music.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_008.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_008.text: D-class target. Eliminate it at once.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_010.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_010.text: B-class target. Attack with full power!

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_011.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMM_011.text: Enemy strength down. We have the advantage.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_SS_002.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_SS_002.text: Don't get near me while I'm in Showstopper Mode!

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMB_003.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMB_003.text: Don't stop until the enemy is defeated.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMB_005.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_COMB_005.text: Was this part of our strategy?

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_CO_001.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_CO_001.text: Combo rate exceeding predictions. Camaraderie is a mighty thing.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_CO_002.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_CO_002.text: Combo rate exceeding critical levels. Activating overdrive.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_FINISH_003.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_FINISH_003.text: A B-class victory. A truly impressive feat.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_RESULT_001.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_RESULT_001.text: Battle complete. Returning to normal operations.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_RESULT_001_B.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_RESULT_001_B.text: Combat data analyzed; system optimization complete.

EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_RESULT_010.speaker: BX10_EX
EV_TEXT_BT_BX10_EX_RESULT_010.text: Combat unsustainable. Withdrawing from the front lines.

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_0.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_0.text: Behold the beginning of an epic tale!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_1.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_1.text: Behold the beginning of an epic tale!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_2.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_2.text: Behold the beginning of an epic tale!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_3.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_3.text: Behold the beginning of an epic tale!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_4.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_4.text: Behold the beginning of an epic tale!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_5.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_5.text: Behold the beginning of an epic tale!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_6.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_6.text: Behold the beginning of an epic tale!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_7.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_003_7.text: Your skill with verse and song is beyond compare!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_009.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_009.text: I could perhaps write an unremarkable poem.

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_010.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_010.text: This will be my masterpiece...now go get 'em!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_011.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMM_011.text: It is high time we hear a poem of victory.

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_SET_001.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_SET_001.text: Listen now to this epic tale of a hero!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_SS_001.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_SS_001.text: A one-man show, is it? I am for you!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_SS_002.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_SS_002.text: I will gratefully accept my fee later!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMB_001.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMB_001.text: Join me in crafting a poem about myself and these new heroes!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMB_002.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMB_002.text: Let us craft an epic tale together!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMB_005.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_COMB_005.text: This brings a lovely poem to mind!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_FINISH_001.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_FINISH_001.text: This will make a terrible poem!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_FINISH_003.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_FINISH_003.text: Clearly reciting poetry is all I am suited to.

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_DEAD_001.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_DEAD_001.text: Load increased. Switching to sleep mode.

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_RESULT_001.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_RESULT_001.text: Another entry in my vast repertoire.

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_RESULT_001_B.text: Oh, what a great job I've done! Now let us discuss my fee!

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_RESULT_002.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_RESULT_002.text: Memory repair in progress. Data for three poems has been lost.

EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_RESULT_010.speaker: Mech_Bard
EV_TEXT_BT_BARD_RESULT_010.text: Hey now! I still require payment for this!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_PARTY_001.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_PARTY_001.text: If my functions cease, you must take care of the rest.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_002.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_002.text: I am a combat mech. Leave the fighting to me.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_0.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_0.text: I was designed for situations just like this!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_1.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_1.text: I was designed for situations just like this!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_2.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_2.text: I was designed for situations just like this!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_3.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_3.text: I was designed for situations just like this!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_4.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_4.text: I was designed for situations just like this!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_5.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_5.text: I was designed for situations just like this!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_6.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_6.text: I was designed for situations just like this!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_7.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_003_7.text: Your singing awakens the spirit of cooperation within us.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_008.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_008.text: Mercy has no place on the battlefield.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_010.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_010.text: All will be lost if we do not win here.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_011.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_COMM_011.text: It's important to stay alert when you have the advantage.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_SET_001.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_SET_001.text: Perhaps the name Gunner suited me!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_CO_001.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_CO_001.text: There are no limits! Keep going!

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_FINISH_003.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_FINISH_003.text: We live to fight another day.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_RESULT_001_B.text: This time, I fight on to the end.

EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_RESULT_002.speaker: Simon
EV_TEXT_BT_SIMON_RESULT_002.text: I won't make the same mistakes I did before.

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_PARTY_001.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_PARTY_001.text: I hope to see new and unfamiliar fiends.

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_002.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_002.text: What sort of foes await me?

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_0.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_0.text: These other worlds are terribly exciting!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_1.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_1.text: These other worlds are terribly exciting!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_2.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_2.text: These other worlds are terribly exciting!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_3.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_3.text: These other worlds are terribly exciting!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_4.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_4.text: These other worlds are terribly exciting!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_5.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_5.text: These other worlds are terribly exciting!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_6.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_6.text: These other worlds are terribly exciting!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_7.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_003_7.text: I never thought I'd fight to a soundtrack! How intriguing these other worlds are.

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_008.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_008.text: A familiar foeâ€”and a weak one.

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_010.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_010.text: I've never seen anything like this!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_011.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMM_011.text: Well, this is anything but boring.

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_SS_001.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_SS_001.text: Time to showcase my knowledge of fiends!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_SS_002.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_SS_002.text: Behold, O great god of the Kikir!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMB_005.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_COMB_005.text: This is new. I think it's...rage?

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_CO_002.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_CO_002.text: Keep going until our foe is defeated!

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_FINISH_001.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_FINISH_001.text: Our foe was weak. This is obvious.

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_FINISH_002.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_FINISH_002.text: An enemy like that is just a nuisance.

EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_FINISH_005.speaker: Kina_Kikiri
EV_TEXT_BT_KINA_FINISH_005.text: Are you interested in my collection?

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_PARTY_001.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_PARTY_001.text: I am tasked with selecting the Knights of the Round Table. I wonder how you'll do.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_002.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_002.text: Go forth and battle, my new Knights of the Round Table!

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_0.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_0.text: It seems curs who would rob people of their freedom can be found everywhere.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_1.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_1.text: It seems curs who would rob people of their freedom can be found everywhere.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_2.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_2.text: It seems curs who would rob people of their freedom can be found everywhere.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_3.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_3.text: It seems curs who would rob people of their freedom can be found everywhere.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_4.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_4.text: It seems curs who would rob people of their freedom can be found everywhere.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_5.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_5.text: It seems curs who would rob people of their freedom can be found everywhere.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_6.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_6.text: It seems curs who would rob people of their freedom can be found everywhere.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_7.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_003_7.text: I was once an avid listener of your songs, Diva, and I would hear you sing once more.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_008.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_008.text: Cute as a button, yet pathetic.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_009.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMM_009.text: Do try not to get in our way.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_SET_001.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_SET_001.text: Let's give it a go, shall we?

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_SS_001.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_SS_001.text: I sit the throne once more!

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_SS_002.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_SS_002.text: Sear the sight of my dancing into your memory!

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMB_003.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_COMB_003.text: Let us proceed to the finale.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_FINISH_002.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_FINISH_002.text: I did warn you not to get in our way.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_FINISH_003.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_FINISH_003.text: Difficulties are meant to be overcome.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_FINISH_004.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_FINISH_004.text: It seems my experience was not all in vain.

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_FINISH_006.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_FINISH_006.text: The ardour within me begins to roil!

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_DEAD_001.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_DEAD_001.text: With this, I am truly free...

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_RESULT_001_B.text: Each day is pure delight now!

EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_RESULT_002.speaker: Guinevere
EV_TEXT_BT_GUINEVERE_RESULT_002.text: I am a sinner most foul...

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_PARTY_001.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_PARTY_001.text: Bloke like me is happy to follow you to the ends of the earth.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_002.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_002.text: I won't say no to a bit of a scrap.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_0.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_0.text: Shoulder to shoulder! There's the way!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_1.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_1.text: Shoulder to shoulder! There's the way!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_2.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_2.text: Shoulder to shoulder! There's the way!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_3.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_3.text: Shoulder to shoulder! There's the way!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_4.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_4.text: Shoulder to shoulder! There's the way!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_5.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_5.text: Shoulder to shoulder! There's the way!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_6.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_6.text: Shoulder to shoulder! There's the way!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_7.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_003_7.text: Don't know much about art, but that's quite the set of pipes you've got, miss.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_008.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_008.text: Feels like a waste of time, this.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_009.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_009.text: Blimey, look at the stones on you!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_010.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_010.text: Looks like this one's throwing a bit of a wobbly!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_011.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMM_011.text: Knights don't give up till the battle's won.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_INSPI_002.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_INSPI_002.text: Seems heaven still wants me after all.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_SS_001.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_SS_001.text: I fight when I want toâ€”and I always want to!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_SS_002.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_SS_002.text: Who wants a little set-to with Lancelot, eh!?

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMB_003.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMB_003.text: This'll end it, and no mistake.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMB_005.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_COMB_005.text: They'll pay for this in spades!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_CO_002.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_CO_002.text: Still got a bit of the ol' welly in me!

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_FINISH_003.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_FINISH_003.text: Does a heart good to see that.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_RESULT_001.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_RESULT_001.text: Guess a man never quits learning.

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_RESULT_002.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_RESULT_002.text: That was a right dog's dinner...

EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_RESULT_010.speaker: Spear
EV_TEXT_BT_SPEAR_RESULT_010.text: Off to the boneyard with us, then...

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_PARTY_001.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_PARTY_001.text: Wheresoever I be, the bond I share with my liege is constant.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_002.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_002.text: Let any who have the courage to cross blades with me step forward!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_0.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_0.text: Let us fight shoulder to shoulder, friend!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_1.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_1.text: Let us fight shoulder to shoulder, friend!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_2.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_2.text: Let us fight shoulder to shoulder, friend!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_3.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_3.text: Let us fight shoulder to shoulder, friend!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_4.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_4.text: Let us fight shoulder to shoulder, friend!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_5.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_5.text: Let us fight shoulder to shoulder, friend!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_6.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_6.text: Let us fight shoulder to shoulder, friend!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_7.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_003_7.text: While I fear I know little of the arts, your singing is like that of angels.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_008.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_008.text: I take no pleasure in fighting the weak.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_009.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_009.text: You are brave indeed to stand before me.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_010.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_010.text: A strong foe brings satisfaction to both body and soul!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_011.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMM_011.text: Give all until the battle is done. That is what it means to be a knight.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_INSPI_002.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_INSPI_002.text: Heaven would see me live on as a knight!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_SS_001.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_SS_001.text: The urge strikes, and thus do I!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_SS_002.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_SS_002.text: Who seeks the honor of fighting Lancelot!?

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMB_005.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_COMB_005.text: I'll not let your sacrifice be in vain, friend!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_CO_001.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_CO_001.text: There's more yet to come! With me!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_CO_002.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_CO_002.text: I can continue if you but believe in me!

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_FINISH_002.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_FINISH_002.text: I offer respect to your courage.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_FINISH_003.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_FINISH_003.text: I am sated, body and soul.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_FINISH_004.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_FINISH_004.text: How fondly I recall this feeling.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_RESULT_001.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_RESULT_001.text: There is still much for me to learn.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_RESULT_001_B.text: I await the day we might stand together once more.

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_RESULT_002.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_RESULT_002.text: I've still a long way to go...

EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_RESULT_010.speaker: Lancelot
EV_TEXT_BT_LANCELOT_RESULT_010.text: Is this the end of your journey?

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_0.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_0.text: This is the source of the great darkness.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_1.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_1.text: This is the source of the great darkness.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_2.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_2.text: This is the source of the great darkness.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_3.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_3.text: This is the source of the great darkness.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_4.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_4.text: This is the source of the great darkness.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_5.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_5.text: This is the source of the great darkness.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_6.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_6.text: This is the source of the great darkness.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_7.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_003_7.text: Perhaps a song will revive feelings long forgotten.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_010.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMM_010.text: Only those willing to sacrifice all might survive.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_SET_001.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_SET_001.text: It seems some strength remains to me.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_INSPI_001.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_INSPI_001.text: I'm wringing out as much power as I can.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_INSPI_002.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_INSPI_002.text: Can this body withstand such power?

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_OA_001.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_OA_001.text: Ahhh, there's the power I've missed.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMB_001.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMB_001.text: I lead strong and storied warriors!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMB_003.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMB_003.text: There can be no going back.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMB_005.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_COMB_005.text: Splendid! Now leave all to me.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_CO_001.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_CO_001.text: We must take advantage of this opportunity.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_FINISH_003.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_FINISH_003.text: I put honor upon your name.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_FINISH_004.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_FINISH_004.text: I name this my own special skill!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_FINISH_006.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_FINISH_006.text: This power grows more familiar by the moment!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_RESULT_001_B.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_RESULT_001_B.text: The souls of many become my strength.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_RESULT_010.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_BT_EMPEROR_RESULT_010.text: In the end, this was all you were.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_PARTY_001.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_PARTY_001.text: You better believe I'll be helpful!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_002.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_002.text: There's nothing I wouldn't do for you!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_0.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_0.text: Can't believe this was the fate of a lowly student like me...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_1.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_1.text: Can't believe this was the fate of a lowly student like me...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_2.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_2.text: Can't believe this was the fate of a lowly student like me...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_3.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_3.text: Can't believe this was the fate of a lowly student like me...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_4.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_4.text: Can't believe this was the fate of a lowly student like me...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_5.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_5.text: Can't believe this was the fate of a lowly student like me...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_6.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_6.text: Can't believe this was the fate of a lowly student like me...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_7.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_003_7.text: Folks sure do love your song, Diva! Lemme hear it one time, eh?

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_008.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_008.text: I bet even I could win this one.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_009.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_009.text: Want me to take this fella out?

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_010.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_010.text: I've got a bad feeling about this...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_011.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_COMM_011.text: I hope we can keep this up!

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_SS_001.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_SS_001.text: Don't much care for standing out, but...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_CO_002.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_CO_002.text: Guess we can do it again.

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_RESULT_001_B.text: Guess I DID work pretty hard...

EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_RESULT_010.speaker: Naomi_Waka
EV_TEXT_BT_NAOMI_RESULT_010.text: So what do I do now?

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_PARTY_001.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_PARTY_001.text: It appears there will be interesting things to see besides history.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_0.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_0.text: Losers are relegated to the dustbin of history.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_1.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_1.text: Losers are relegated to the dustbin of history.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_2.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_2.text: Losers are relegated to the dustbin of history.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_3.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_3.text: Losers are relegated to the dustbin of history.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_4.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_4.text: Losers are relegated to the dustbin of history.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_5.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_5.text: Losers are relegated to the dustbin of history.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_6.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_6.text: Losers are relegated to the dustbin of history.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_7.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_003_7.text: I'm intrigued to see how singing affects combat abilities.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_008.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_008.text: This one's lacking as a research subject.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_009.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_009.text: Let's not spend too much time on this.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_011.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMM_011.text: Let's get this over withâ€”I have research to complete!

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_SET_001.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_SET_001.text: One must handle their resources effectively.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_INSPI_001.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_INSPI_001.text: I should run some tests on this...

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_INSPI_002.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_INSPI_002.text: If only I had such glimmers in my research!

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_OA_001.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_OA_001.text: Only I could execute such an idea!

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_SS_001.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_SS_001.text: Oh, very wellâ€”but just this once!

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMB_001.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_COMB_001.text: Should I be the one in the lead?

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_CO_001.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_CO_001.text: Clearly we share a symbiotic relationship.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_DEAD_001.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_DEAD_001.text: I'd hoped to avoid this kind of thing...

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_RESULT_002.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_RESULT_002.text: Failure is the mother of success.

EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_RESULT_010.speaker: Professor
EV_TEXT_BT_PROFESSOR_RESULT_010.text: Couldn't we have seen a little more?

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_PARTY_001.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_PARTY_001.text: I will sing by your side forevermore.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_COMM_003_7.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_COMM_003_7.text: I know how much it hurts to not singâ€”but I also know you can do this! I believe in you!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_COMM_008.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_COMM_008.text: Let's just call this a warm-up.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_COMM_009.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_COMM_009.text: Being on stage is way harder than this.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_COMM_010.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_COMM_010.text: This is tough, but I'm tougher!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_INSPI_001.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_INSPI_001.text: It's like I just thought up a new melody!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_INSPI_002.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_INSPI_002.text: I just thought of a great hook!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_SS_002.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_SS_002.text: You have to give the fans what they want!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_CO_002.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_CO_002.text: Here's one from my newest album!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_FINISH_001.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_FINISH_001.text: Were you lost in my song?

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_FINISH_003.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_FINISH_003.text: The best inspiration strikes when you're backed into a corner!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_FINISH_004.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_FINISH_004.text: That was a bit of improv, but it felt good.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_FINISH_006.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_FINISH_006.text: I felt something flooding out of my soul!

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_RESULT_001_B.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_RESULT_001_B.text: My fans are gonna LOVE this.

EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_RESULT_002.speaker: Emily_Bryant
EV_TEXT_BT_EMILY_RESULT_002.text: I bet some music big-wig is laughing right now...

EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_01.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_01.text: All worlds are linked to the Conjoined Worlds. Do you know what this means?

EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_02.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_02.text: All worlds will become one! THIS is how the Conjoined Worlds should be!

EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_03.text: I dunno, fella. I think the universe is more interesting when all the worlds are separate.

EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_04.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_04.text: Diversity is but a mere fluctuation; the universe will find ultimate beauty in assimilation!

EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_05.text: Thanks, but I'll pass on a universe where you and me are the same.

EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_06.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_06.text: No! You MUST accept my will!

EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_W14_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_00_07.text: Or you can quit your yammering and accept my version of things, maybe?

EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_01.text:
You can go on all you want about how this is 'the way of the universe,'
but I got no interest in living in a place like that.

EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_1_01.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_1_01.text: We have protected the purity of countless worlds, for we are their guardians!

EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_1_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_1_02.text: That ain't for you to decide, bud. It's up to the worlds to decide what happens to 'em.

EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_1_03.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_1_03.text: The guiding principles of the universe decide all, and they cannot be opposed!

EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_2_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_00_2_01.text: Well, guess this is where the show really startsâ€”or not so much the show as the final battle.

EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_01_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_01_01.text: Yak yak yak, cram it already. I've had just about enough of you, guy.

EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_01_1_01.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_01_1_01.text: You were wrought by the principles underlying the Conjoined Worlds! You cannot hope to oppose them!

EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_01_2_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_C01_MIDO_LASTABATTLE_01_2_01.text:
I mean, sure, maybe I never tried to go against my mother or Dad,
but I'll stand against you till the cows come home!

EV_TEXT_W01_AMYA_INITIAL_00_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_W01_AMYA_INITIAL_00_02.text: I'll show you the power of a witch!

EV_TEXT_W01_AMYA_INITIAL_00_03.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W01_AMYA_INITIAL_00_03.text: Ah, but you are no witch. Not yet.

EV_TEXT_C01_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_00_2_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_C01_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_00_2_01.text: No matter how many times you do this, the result will be the same: victory for the witch!

EV_TEXT_C01_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_01_2_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_C01_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_01_2_01.text: The power of magic ALWAYS triumphs!

EV_TEXT_W02_MACHA_00_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_W02_MACHA_00_01.text: My power has surpassed a goddess! AAAH HA HA HA HA!

EV_TEXT_W02_GREYWITCH_10_01.speaker: GreyWitch
EV_TEXT_W02_GREYWITCH_10_01.text: No! NO! Must I again wait for the next Calamity!? For the next Watcher!?

EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W01_SIUG_GOKAKUDO_10.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W01_SIUG_GOKAKUDO_10.text: O protector spirits of Miyako City, return to your rest!

EV_TEXT_C01_SIUG_LASTABATTLE_01_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_C01_SIUG_LASTABATTLE_01_01.text: You wretch! Do you think you have become some manner of shepherd?

EV_TEXT_C01_SIUG_LASTABATTLE_01_02.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_C01_SIUG_LASTABATTLE_01_02.text: You are fated to dance in the palm of my hand, the same as any other!

EV_TEXT_C01_SIUG_LASTABATTLE_01_1_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_C01_SIUG_LASTABATTLE_01_1_01.text: You are naught but a part of this world.

EV_TEXT_C01_SIUG_LASTABATTLE_01_2_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_C01_SIUG_LASTABATTLE_01_2_01.text: I am the Dismal King, and I will pass through the door by my own power!

EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_00_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_00_01.text: I will see for myself how great your strength is.

EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_00_02.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_00_02.text: Do not assume this is the full extent of our power.

EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_00_1_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_00_1_01.text: That was hardly any power at all. Perhaps you should apply more effort.

EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_00_2_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_00_2_01.text: It seems the time has finally come for me to give my all.

EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_RAGE_00_2_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W03_SIUG_RAGE_00_2_01.text: Do you desire for me to kill you?

EV_TEXT_C01_DIVA_LASTABATTLE_00_02.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_C01_DIVA_LASTABATTLE_00_02.text: So sorry, love, but I won't be doing that until after I smack ya upside the head!

EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W18_BAF_LASTABATTLE_00.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W18_BAF_LASTABATTLE_00.text: I'll back you up as best I can. Give it everything you've got.

EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W18_BAF_LASTABATTLE_00_1.speaker: Tristan_Hernandes
EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W18_BAF_LASTABATTLE_00_1.text: Don't let up until it's over!

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_MIDO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_MIDO.text: Now ain't the time to noodle over stuff. We gotta throw everything we have at this!

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_SIUG.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_SIUG.text: I will abide by her planâ€”for now.

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_DIVA.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_DIVA.text: I dinnae know what they're planning, but I suppose we need to go along with it for now.

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_BONN.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_BONN.text: She's the real shady type, but we ain't got a choice but to go along.

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_FORM.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_00_01_FORM.text: We just have to avoid the worst-case scenario.

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_MIDO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_MIDO.text: Now ain't the time to noodle over stuff. We gotta throw everything we have at this!

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_SIUG.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_SIUG.text: I will abide by her planâ€”for now.

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_DIVA.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_DIVA.text: I dinnae know what they're planning, but I suppose we need to along with it for now.

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_BONN.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_BONN.text: She's the real shady type, but we ain't got a choice but to go along.

EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_FORM.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_W02_BLACKSWAN_10_01_FORM.text: We just have to avoid the worst-case scenario.

EV_TEXT_W02_LASTBATTLE_90_01.speaker: GreyWitch
EV_TEXT_W02_LASTBATTLE_90_01.text: See now the power of the grey!

EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W02_LASTBATTLE_90.speaker: Lita_Caryx
EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W02_LASTBATTLE_90.text: I won't let you have your way!

EV_TEXT_W02_LASTBATTLE_90_02.speaker: GreyWitch
EV_TEXT_W02_LASTBATTLE_90_02.text: My strength fails... Must I wait again for the next Calamity!? For the next Watcher!?

EV_TEXT_W02_LASTBATTLE_91_01.speaker: GreyWitch
EV_TEXT_W02_LASTBATTLE_91_01.text: See now the power of the grey!

EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W02_LASTBATTLE_91.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W02_LASTBATTLE_91.text: I'll not let you turn Pulchra grey!

EV_TEXT_W02_LASTBATTLE_91_02.speaker: GreyWitch
EV_TEXT_W02_LASTBATTLE_91_02.text: My strength fails... Must I wait again for the next Calamity!? For the next Watcher!?

EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_00_02.speaker: Lord_Rage
EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_00_02.text: I know you can do this!

EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_00_03.speaker: Lord_Sloth
EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_00_03.text: We might actually have a shot.

EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_00_04.speaker: Lord_Lust
EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_00_04.text: Just a sacrificial pawn in the end.

EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_01_01.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_01_01.text: I don't believe it! We might have a chance.

EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_01_02.speaker: Lord_Rage
EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_01_02.text: Now! Fight like a drowning man!

EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_01_03.speaker: Lord_Sloth
EV_TEXT_W03_KINGMONSTER_01_03.text: Better not to get my hopes up.

EV_TEXT_W04_BALTASAR_11_1_01.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W04_BALTASAR_11_1_01.text: My healing is slowin'? ...No. There's still time. I'll kill the lot of ya!

EV_TEXT_W04_SIGULD_10_01.speaker: Siguld
EV_TEXT_W04_SIGULD_10_01.text: I won't let some cur what's got nothing to do with this stick their nose in!

EV_TEXT_W04_BALTASAR_12_02.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W04_BALTASAR_12_02.text: Heh heh heh. This is what it means to be immortal!

EV_TEXT_W04_BALTASAR_12_04.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W04_BALTASAR_12_04.text: Hey! Plannin' to keep this up?

EV_TEXT_W04_BALTASAR_12_05.speaker: NoSpeaker
EV_TEXT_W04_BALTASAR_12_05.text: Ain't it about time ya call it quits?

EV_TEXT_W04_SIGULD_99_01.speaker: Siguld
EV_TEXT_W04_SIGULD_99_01.text: Yer but a plaything for Sigurd, great pirate of the White Whales!

EV_TEXT_W04_SIGULD_99_02.speaker: Siguld
EV_TEXT_W04_SIGULD_99_02.text: Don't ya realize yer bein' manipulated by Deus Maris!?

EV_TEXT_W04_SIGULD_99_03.speaker: Siguld
EV_TEXT_W04_SIGULD_99_03.text: Damn it all! How could this be?

EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W10_CLTOSS_02.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W10_CLTOSS_02.text: Intervening in the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen's system.

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_MIDO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_MIDO.text: Can you hear me, Chup!? Hang in there until we defeat Ancikar's fiends!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_AMYA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_AMYA.text: Can you hear me, Chup!? Hang on until we defeat Ancikar's fiends!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_SIUG.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_SIUG.text: Listen to me, Chup! You must endure until Ancikar's demons have been exorcised!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_DIVA.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_DIVA.text: This is your final test, love, so let's pass it together!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_BONN.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_BONN.text: Hang in there until we defeat Ancikar's fiends, darlin'!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_FORM.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_20_01_FORM.text: Chup! Hold on until we defeat Ancikar's fiends!

EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W11_EPUIKE_20_A.speaker: Kupu
EV_TEXT_GS_BS_W11_EPUIKE_20_A.text: Can you hear me, Sis!? It's Kup!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_MIDO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_MIDO.text: Can you hear me there, Nana!? I need your help! You gotta fight with me!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_AMYA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_AMYA.text: Can you hear me there, Nana!? I need your help!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_SIUG.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_SIUG.text: Hear me, Nana. You are the maiden of the Epuyke, and I have need of your strength.

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_DIVA.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_DIVA.text: Please, Nana! Lend me your strength as the Epuyke's maiden!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_BONN.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_BONN.text: Don't lose to Ancikar, now! We need you in this fight!

EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_FORM.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_W11_EPUIKE_31_01_FORM.text: Fight, Nana! Don't lose to Ancikar!

EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_05_01.speaker: LastEmperor
EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_05_01.text: You scum won't last but a moment!

EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_MIDO.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_MIDO.text: We can't let him get out like this.

EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_AMYA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_AMYA.text: We can't leave the final emperor like this.

EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_SIUG.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_SIUG.text: And what now, Final Emperor? Your foolish puppet is gone.

EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_DIVA.speaker: Diva_No5
EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_DIVA.text: Caution. The final emperor is still alive!

EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_BONN.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_BONN.text: You can't just use people like that! Fellers like you really grind my gears.

EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_FORM.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_09_02_FORM.text: Final Emperor...! I won't stand for this!

EV_TEXT_W12_EMPEROR_10_02_MIDO.text: We can't let him get out like this.
